alert.note: Alert for Crane; Pecos; Reeves; Ward (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 23 at 8:16PM CST until January 23 at 9:15PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Pecos County in southwestern Texas... East central Reeves County in southwestern Texas... Southeastern Ward County in western Texas... Crane County in western Texas... * Until 915 PM CST. * At 816 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 20 miles southeast of Barstow to 21 miles south of Grandfalls to 7 miles southwest of Fort Stockton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Belding Mesonet reported a 58 MPH wind gust at 802 PM CST. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Stockton, Crane, Grandfalls, Fort Stockton-Pecos County Airport, Coyanosa, Imperial Reservoir, Crane County Airport, Bakersfield, Girvin, Royalty, B F Goodrich Testing Track, Imperial, and Cordona Lake. This includes Interstate 10 between mile markers 249 and 298. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
